GenericExceptionMessage: United data services are not currently available.
MPValidationErrorMessage: The account information you entered is incorrect.
bugBountySessionExpiredMsg: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
GetProfileException: We are unable to retrieve your stored credit card details.
Booking2OGenericExceptionMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
ValidateMPNameMisMatchErrorMessage: The traveler information you entered does not match our records. Please revise the traveler’s name and/or the frequent flyer program account number.
BalanceExpireDisclaimerNeverExpire: Great travel memories never expire, and now, miles don’t either. We’re excited to share that there’s no expiration date on the miles you’ve earned with us.
ChaseNoMileageExpirationMessage: Great travel memories never expire, and now, miles don’t either. We’re excited to share that there’s no expiration date on the miles you’ve earned with us.
MyAccountForceUpdateMessage: Our MileagePlus Premier program is evolving. Download the latest version of the United app to track your Premier progress.
BalanceExpireDisclaimer: As long as you earn or use MileagePlus award miles at least once every 18 months, your award miles will never expire. You can earn or redeem award miles for travel, hotel stays and car rentals, and for a variety of products and services available from partners worldwide. The mileage expiration policy applies to all MileagePlus accounts.
UnableToInsertCreditCardToProfileErrorMe: Unable to insert credit card details.
TSAAccountMessage: There are inconsistencies with your traveler information. To comply with the TSA Secure Flight program and ensure that you receive correct mileage and other MileagePlus® benefits, visit united.com to correct the traveler information in your MileagePlus profile.
promotionNotFoundMessage: Unable to get the promotion due to jsonResponse has no Promotions
VBQModelTitle: Our MileagePlus Premier program is evolving.
VBQModelDescription: Beginning on January 1, 2020, our program is changing: you’ll earn credit based on the value of the tickets you’ve purchased (PQP) and the number of flights you’ve taken (PQF). You’ll also be able to earn PQP on select flights ticketed and operated by Star Alliance partners, paid upgrades on United, MileagePlus Upgrade Award co-pays, and from spend on your co-branded Chase card.
TCDAdvisoryMessages1: PhoneEmail~Providing a traveler’s mobile number and/or email address indicates that he or she consents to receive SMS and/or email messages via the contact information provided concerning flight status updates or notifications, and as otherwise permitted by our privacy policy. Standard messaging and data rates may apply. Messaging frequency varies based on customer preferences and the status of flight operations.~false
TCDAdvisoryMessages2: PurchaseTnC~Purchase of this ticket means you understand and agree to all fare rules associated with this ticket, all terms and conditions associated with any additional offer/product purchases made, United’s dangerous goods policy, and the terms and conditions in United’s Contract of Carriage.~false
TCDAdvisoryMessages3: TCDmessage~View text messaging terms and conditions. U.S. supported carriers are AT&T, U.S. Cellular®, Verizon Wireless, Sprint, Cricket, Boost, Virgin Mobile USA , T-Mobile® and MetroPCS. Canadian supported carriers are Aliant Mobility, Bell Mobility, Eastlink, Fido, Mobilicity, MTS, NorthernTel Mobility, Public Mobile, Rogers Wireless, SaskTel Mobility, Télébec Mobilité, TELUS Mobility, Vidéotron, Virgin Mobile Canada, WIND Mobile. The wireless carriers are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages. U.S. and Canadian customers may opt out at any time by texting STOP to 26266 from their mobile device. For more information, text HELP to 26266 or call 1-800-UNITED-1 (1-800-864-8331).~false
TCDAdvisoryMessagesForELF: Purchase of this ticket means you understand and agree to all fare rules associated with this nonrefundable/non-changeable Basic Economy ticket, United's dangerous goods policy, and the terms and conditions in United's Contract of Carriage, and the collection, processing and transfer of your information to the United States for handling in accordance with our privacy policy.
TCDAdvisoryMessagesForIBELite: Purchase of this ticket means you understand and agree to all fare rules associated with this nonrefundable/non-changeable ticket, United’s dangerous goods policy, and the terms and conditions in United’s Contract of Carriage, and the collection, processing and transfer of your information to the United States for handling in accordance with our privacy policy.

TCDAdvisoryMessagesForNonRefundableNonCh: Purchase of this ticket means you understand and agree to all fare rules associated with this nonrefundable and non-changeable ticket, United’s dangerous goods policy, and the terms and conditions in United's Contract of Carriage, and the collection, processing and transfer of your information to the United States for handling in accordance with our privacy policy.

CreditCardSelectedForContactlessTitle: Save credit card for inflight purchases
CreditCardSelectedForContactlessMessage: We'll save your credit card so when you fly, you'll be able to make onboard contactless purchases. You'll be unable to swipe a credit card in flight.
PriceChangeMessage: Based on the traveler information provided, the price of  your ticket has changed and is shown below.
TPIinfo_BookingPath_PopUpMessage: Due to changes with your purchase that altered your total price, your travel insurance policy has been adjusted from {0} to {1}.
TPIinfo_BookingPath_CoverCostTest: Travel insurance coverage is based on total cost of trip
UpliftChangeInTravelerMessage: Changing or adding a new traveler will require you to reapply for Pay Monthly.
ETCChangeInTravelerMessage: Editing or adding will remove the electronic travel certificate associated with the traveler.
TPIinfo_ConfirmationPage_BilledSeperateT: (Billed separately By Travel Guard Group Inc.)
TPIPurchaseResposne-ConfirmationResponse: A confirmation email has been sent to

You have elected to purchase Travel Guard's trip insurance. Plan benefits, along with applicable definitions and terms of coverage, are fully described in your Policy of Insurance. It is your responsibility to read and understand the details of your coverage.
You can reach Travel Guard at 1.877.934.8308 to inquire about the product or file a claim.

WheelChairSizeSuccessMsg: Your wheelchair will fit through the cargo doors for the United flights you have selected.
ExtraSeatMessageForEditTraveler: You can't change a traveler to an extra seat
UnaccompaniedDisclaimerMessage: Children under the age of 5 cannot travel unless they're accompanied by a parent, legal guardian or someone who is atleast 18 years old. Children ages 5-17 who are traveling unaccompanied must use our unaccompanied service, which can not be booked with the United app. Please go to united.com to book.
ProvisionLoginMessage: Sign in to Chase to add your card for this purchase and to United wallet
DuplicateTravelerMessage: You have entered two travelers with the same name. Please adjust the Title, First Name, Last Name, Middle Initial, and/ or Suffix of one or both names. The name entered must match your government-issued photo ID.
